bridge-type.label: RFXtrx315 USB 315MHz Transceiver
bridge-type.description: This is an RFXCOM 315MHz transceiver bridge.

parameter.name: bridgeId
parameter.label: Serial number
parameter.description: Serial number of the RFXCOM (FTDI) device

parameter.name: ignoreConfig
parameter.label: Skip transceiver configuration
parameter.description: Fully skip and ignore RFXCOM transceiver configuration. Binding assume that RFXCOM transceiver is preconfigured e.g. via RFXcom Manager. When this is enabled, both set mode command and individual message configurations are ignored.

parameter.name: setMode
parameter.label: RFXCOM transceiver mode
parameter.description: RFXCOM transceiver set mode command. Command should be in hexadecimal string format and 28 characters (14 bytes) long. If set mode command is given, individual message configurations are ignored.

parameter.name: enableUndecoded
parameter.label: Undecoded messages
parameter.description: Enable display of unencoded messages to RFXCOM transceiver.

parameter.name: enableVisonic
parameter.label: Visonic messages
parameter.description: Enable Visonic messages to RFXCOM transceiver.

parameter.name: enableX10
parameter.label: X10 messages
parameter.description: Enable X10 messages to RFXCOM transceiver.
